Package org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff

Class DiffFilter

java.lang.Object
org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff.DiffFilter
public class DiffFilter extends Object
A filter for commits and patches. Can only be created using a DiffFilter.Builder.
Author:
SÃ¶ren Viegener, Paul Bittner

  • Field Details

    • ALLOW_ALL

      public static final DiffFilter ALLOW_ALL
      A filter that does not filter any commits or patches. Using this filter will allow to inspect the entire revision history.

  • Method Details

    • filter

      public boolean filter​(PatchDiff patchDiff)
      Applies this filter to the given PatchDiff. The given PatchDiff remains unmodifed.
      Parameters:
      patchDiff - The PatchDiff whose inclusion should be checked.
      Returns:
      True iff the given patch should be considered w.r.t. this filter. False iff it should be ignored.

    • filter

      public boolean filter​(org.eclipse.jgit.diff.DiffEntry diffEntry)
      Applies this filter to the given DiffEntry. The given DiffEntry remains unmodifed.
      Parameters:
      diffEntry - The DiffEntry whose inclusion should be checked.
      Returns:
      True iff the given entry should be considered w.r.t. this filter. False iff it should be ignored.

    • filter

      public boolean filter​(org.eclipse.jgit.revwalk.RevCommit commit)
      Applies this filter to the given commit. The given RevCommit remains unmodifed.
      Parameters:
      commit - The commit whose inclusion should be checked.
      Returns:
      True iff the given commit should be considered w.r.t. this filter. False iff it should be ignored.
